text: A youth-led development is a project mainly made by young people. Most organizations use the United Nation's definition of youth which is a person between the ages of 15 and 24. ==Youth-led Organization== A youth-led organization focuses on youth-led development and usually has a team made up of young people. ==References== ==Other websites== *UYDO official homepage *U8 official homepage *EWB official homepage *Restless Development official homepage Category:Youth activists
title: Youth-led development
